org.bytedeco.liquidfun

Class b2BodyDef

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytedeco.javacpp.Pointer
      • org.bytedeco.liquidfun.b2BodyDef
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    @NoOffset
 @Properties(inherit=liquidfun.class)
public class b2BodyDef
extends Pointer
    A body definition holds all the data needed to construct a rigid body. You can safely re-use body definitions. Shapes are added to a body after construction.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.bytedeco.javacpp.Pointer

      • type

        @Cast(value="b2BodyType")
public int type()
        The body type: static, kinematic, or dynamic. Note: if a dynamic body would have zero mass, the mass is set to one.

      • type

        public b2BodyDef type(int setter)

      • _position

        @ByRef
 @Name(value="position")
public b2Vec2 _position()
        The world position of the body. Avoid creating bodies at the origin since this can lead to many overlapping shapes.

      • linearDamping

        @Cast(value="float32")
public float linearDamping()
        Linear damping is use to reduce the linear velocity. The damping parameter can be larger than 1.0f but the damping effect becomes sensitive to the time step when the damping parameter is large.

      • linearDamping

        public b2BodyDef linearDamping(float setter)

      • angularDamping

        @Cast(value="float32")
public float angularDamping()
        Angular damping is use to reduce the angular velocity. The damping parameter can be larger than 1.0f but the damping effect becomes sensitive to the time step when the damping parameter is large.

      • angularDamping

        public b2BodyDef angularDamping(float setter)

      • allowSleep

        @Cast(value="bool")
public boolean allowSleep()
        Set this flag to false if this body should never fall asleep. Note that this increases CPU usage.

      • allowSleep

        public b2BodyDef allowSleep(boolean setter)

      • awake

        @Cast(value="bool")
public boolean awake()
        Is this body initially awake or sleeping?

        @Cast(value="bool")
public boolean fixedRotation()
        Should this body be prevented from rotating? Useful for characters.

      • fixedRotation

        public b2BodyDef fixedRotation(boolean setter)

      • bullet

        @Cast(value="bool")
public boolean bullet()
        Is this a fast moving body that should be prevented from tunneling through other moving bodies? Note that all bodies are prevented from tunneling through kinematic and static bodies. This setting is only considered on dynamic bodies. \warning You should use this flag sparingly since it increases processing time.

      • bullet

        public b2BodyDef bullet(boolean setter)

      • active

        @Cast(value="bool")
public boolean active()
        Does this body start out active?
